nodes.description: 黎巴嫩萨ida市东部郊区发生炸弹袭击，造成1人死亡、10人受伤，袭击对象为什叶派聚居区的公寓楼
nodes.support_text: A Lebanese man was killed and 10 other people wounded Thursday night in a bomb attack in an eastern suburb of the southern city of Saida, police said.

nodes.description: 黎巴嫩总理拉菲克·哈里里在巴黎与法国总统希拉克会谈，呼吁欧盟在伊拉克问题上达成共识
nodes.support_text: Lebanese Prime Minister Rafiq Hariri on Wednesday urged European Union states to overcome their differences on the Iraq crisis, following talks in Paris with French President Jacques Chirac.

nodes.description: 以色列外交部指控伊朗和黎巴嫩真主党参与1994年布宜诺斯艾利斯以色列使馆爆炸案
nodes.support_text: Israel has evidence of Tehran's involvement not only in the 1994 bombing of a Jewish community centre, but also in a 1992 attack on the Israeli embassy.

nodes.description: 伊朗回应以色列指控，再次否认真主党参与1992年和1994年对以色列目标的袭击
nodes.support_text: Hezbollah again denied involvement in two deadly bombings of Jewish targets in Buenos Aires in the 1990s.

nodes.description: 伊拉克什叶派难民乌姆·穆罕默德公开支持对伊拉克开战，希望推翻萨达姆政权

nodes.description: 法国总统希拉克与英国首相布莱尔在欧盟峰会上就伊拉克军事行动问题展开博弈
nodes.support_text: Chirac looked set for a showdown with British Prime Minister Tony Blair on the issue at the two-day summit.

nodes.description: 美国宣布将发布《中东和平路线图》，要求巴勒斯坦任命具有实权的总理分享权力
nodes.support_text: US President George W. Bush announced Friday he would publish the long-awaited 'roadmap'.
